Reference

All functions

contemp_nds()

Select Contemporaneous Nodes

labels_shadow()

Plot Labels with Contrasting Shadow

nds_compar() eds_compar() list_compar()

Graph Pairwise Comparison on Common Elements

list_dec()

Create Decoration's Graphs and Store them in a List

named_elements()

Textual Notation of Graph Elements

plot_compar()

Plot and Save Comparison Figures Between Pairs of Graphs

plot_dec_grph()

Plot a Graph on a Decoration

read_eds()

Read Edges of a Decoration

read_nds()

Read Nodes of a Decoration

same_elements()

Number of Equal Elements Between Each Decoration Pair

side_plot()

Plot Two Figures Side-by-Side Identifying Common Elements
